alert.note: Alert for Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:52PM CDT until June 29 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tangipahoa Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 352 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Folsom, or 12 miles northeast of Hammond, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Independence, Natalbany and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana near mile marker 36. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
